column2: \[\cos x + \frac{{\sin x}}{{\cot x}} = \frac{{\cot x + \tan x}}{{\csc x}}\]
\[\frac{{\sin x}}{{\sec x - 1}} - \frac{{\sin x}}{{\sec x + 1}} = 2\cos x\cot x\]
\[\frac{{\csc x - 1}}{{\cot x}} + \frac{{\cot x}}{{\csc x + 1}} = \frac{{2\cos x}}{{1 + \sin x}}\]
\[\frac{{\sec x - 1}}{{\tan x}} + \frac{{\tan x}}{{\sec x + 1}} = \frac{{2\sin x}}{{1 + \cos x}}\]
\[\frac{{\sec x - \tan x}}{{\cos x}} - \frac{{\cos x}}{{\sec x + \tan x}} = \frac{{{{\sin }^2}x}}{{1 + \sin x}}\]
\[\frac{{\cos x}}{{\sec x - \tan x}} + \frac{{\sin x\cos x}}{{\sec x + \tan x}} = {\cos ^2}x + 2\sin x\]
\[\frac{{\cos x}}{{1 - \tan x}} + \frac{{\sin x}}{{1 + \cot x}} = \sin x + \cos x\]
